description: This Chevrolet Silverado 1500 is a reliable and powerful pickup truck. It features a 2018 model year with a sleek design and a comfortable interior. With a price of $28,999, it offers excellent value for its performance and capabilities. The Silverado 1500 is equipped with a V8 engine, providing ample power for towing and hauling. Its exterior is adorned with stylish features, and the interior offers modern amenities for a comfortable driving experience. This truck has had two previous owners, John Smith and Jane Doe, with records of ownership dates and an accident history. It also comes with a gallery of images showcasing its appearance. Overall, this Chevrolet Silverado 1500 is a great option for those in need of a reliable and versatile pickup truck.

The 2018 Dodge Charger is a powerful and stylish sedan that offers impressive performance and modern features. With its sleek design and bold grille, the Charger commands attention on the road. Equipped with a potent V6 engine and smooth handling, this Charger delivers thrilling driving dynamics. The interior is spacious and comfortable, with a user-friendly infotainment system and advanced safety features. Whether you're cruising on the highway or tackling twisty roads, the Charger delivers a thrilling driving experience that is sure to impress.

With its efficient engine and smooth transmission, the Accord delivers excellent fuel economy without sacrificing performance. The interior is well-crafted and spacious, with a host of standard features including a touchscreen infotainment system and rearview camera. The Accord also boasts impressive safety ratings, making it an ideal choice for families. Whether you're commuting to work or embarking on a road trip, the Accord provides a dependable and enjoyable driving experience.

It has been well-maintained and comes with a history of ownership and accident information for transparency. Don't miss out on this reliable and affordable Ford Focus!

The truck has been involved in an accident in August 2014 when it was rear-ended by another car. Please see the attached images for more details.
